definition: certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: Please present identifications to purchase concession tickets.
sentences.chinese: 購買優待票請出示證件。

sentences.english: Here are our identifications. (Or, Here are our IDS. )
You need to fill out an application and have your official copy of school transcripts sent to them.
sentences.chinese: 你需要填一張申請表，並送交一份學校的有效證件。

sentences.english: Guards watch one document, only know that the ordinary people dress was president.
sentences.chinese: 衛兵一看證件，才知道這個普通着裝的人竟是大總統。

sentences.english: Application Form for Student Identification Card (Campus Bank Card …
sentences.chinese: 國立高雄餐旅學院在校生證件申請表。

sentences.english: To use the Internet you must show a valid I. D.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想上網，必須要出示有效的身份證件。

sentences.english: Jack flashes his badge and tells her he’s after a suspect.
sentences.chinese: 傑克亮出了他的證件，稱自己是在追擊嫌犯。

sentences.english: Details of participants (name & HKID/travel document number) must be submitted at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 負責領袖必須於遞交參加者中英姓名及證件號碼。

sentences.english: Police may ask you to show your documents in any moment.
sentences.chinese: 警察可能會隨時要求你出示證件。

sentences.english: When you do the exam you must bring the same identity card.
sentences.chinese: 考試當日，您必須使用同一張身份證件參加考試。

sentences.english: Not even a passport or ID paper.
sentences.chinese: 甚至沒有護照或身份證件。

sentences.english: You'd better send your certificate through registered post because it is safer.
sentences.chinese: 買房時不要忘了帶戶口本，這是很重要的證件。

sentences.english: OK finally by registered permanent residence this such effective certificate is dealt with afresh.
sentences.chinese: 最後可以憑戶口本這樣的有效證件重新辦理。

sentences.english: You'll get your card in a week after receiving the required documents from you.
sentences.chinese: 在收到規定證件後，一週之內您可以拿到牡丹卡。

sentences.english: Mr. Lee: Hmmm … a photo I. D. I have my New Jersey driver's license. Is that ok?
sentences.chinese: 有照片的證件。我有新澤西的駕駛執照，可以嗎？

sentences.english: Upon expiration of the lease, the Leasee shall return the Leased Vehicle and effective certificates on schedule.
sentences.chinese: 租賃期滿，應按時返還租賃車輛及有效證件。

definition: a pass (authority to enter)/a laissez-passer or safe conduct
identity card/also written 身份證|身份证[shen1 fen4 zheng4]
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]
to fill in a form/to write data in a box (on a questionnaire or web form)
to cross a barrier/to get through (an ordeal)/to pass (a test)/to reach (a standard)
population (counted as number of households for census or taxation)/registered residence/residence permit/(in Hong Kong and Macau) bank account
